>>A building subjected to wind loads may often be modeled as a:<< ( ) A column (x) A beam ( ) A table ( ) A wall
[explanation] A building subjected to wind loads is often modeled as a cantilever beam, with the base fixed and the building extending upward. So it is just a beam that is rotated 90 degrees. [explanation]
